participant_1.background: i volunteer in a homeless shelter. i'm a professional wrestler. i enjoy being around people. in my spare time i do volunteer work.

participant_2.background: i'm a buddhist. i live in alaska. i've not spoken in three months. i like meditation. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time.

content.text: hello, how are you? do you have any hobbies? I like to volunteer
